Comment: In order:  1) Whether or not the courts are going to be to enforce the order that he be returned or if they will allow the executive to ignore them.   2) If he is returned if he's actually going to get the due process that he and others are entitled to and what that will look like. The courts have issued a number of rulings requiring the executive to do various things before they deport anyone else. So far they've resisted complying.   3) Assuming he is returned and actually gets any due process, f he's deportable or not.   4) Is the AEA constitutional?   5) If so, does it apply?  6) If he's deportable, if there is a country we can legally deport him to?  Please note that whether or not he's MS13 is not relevant to most of those. Perhaps 5, if by some miracle the courts uphold the AEA. Perhaps 6 if prior court finding that he might face retaliation in his home country holds up. But legally it's largely irrelevant and we have to overcome a couple legitimate constitutional crises to even get there. His fucking knuckle tattoos should be so far down on the list of things that intelligent people care about that it's fucking annoying to see people wasting time on it. Especially when it just tends to make everyone involved, including the people claiming his deportation is based on "doctored" photos, look like idiots that don't understand what's really at issue. It's absurd.
Author: Talondel

Comment: It was more of a challenge than I have seen at any of his pressers in a long time. No matter how forcefully he's pressed, Trump is a malignant narcissist and is never going to admit he's wrong. Better to make your point and move on. Moran, got the point across to anyone who is not part of the MAGA cult that Trump is a deranged old man with a feeble grasp on reality who should be in an institution talking to the plants, not in the White House talking to journalists. I'd be surprised if anyone in two minds about Trump, after watching this performance, didn't come away thinking we must have been insane to have voted this man into the most powerful job in the world, and he should be removed ASAP.     MAGA doesn't care what Trump says, or what he does. Trump is God. They are a lost cause.
